name: Rosy Edge
description: An elegant frost blade that conjures up images of a pure white flower blooming on a snow-covered cliff.

normals.name: Heavy Cleave
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing a greatsword to attack **4** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.9%** of ATK plus **437** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **60.1%** of ATK plus **361** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **105.4%** of ATK plus **632** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **156.3%** of ATK plus **938**, **strongly launch** the target, then launch them upon landing.

normals.name: Aerial Strike
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack **4** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **106.5%** of ATK plus **639**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **87.5%** of ATK plus **525**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **156%** of ATK plus **936**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **140.5%** of ATK plus **843** and deliver a **knockdown**, launch the target upon landing.

normals.name: Rising Slash
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash.
Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to **64.3%**of ATK plus **386**.

normals.name: Moonset Slash
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonset Slash.
While falling, each hit deals damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK plus **75**. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **140.5%** of ATK plus **843** and launch targets.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK plus **3420**.

normals.name: Whirlwind
normals.description: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to **132.8%** of ATK plus **797** every **0.5** seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: **15** seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Devastate
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Devastate.
Deal damage equal to **65.9%** of ATK plus **395** each hit and **launch** targets.

dodge.name: Crescent Slash
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash.
Swing the greatsword to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to **49.6%** of ATK plus **298**.

skill.name: Blizzard
skill.description: Swing the greatsword to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to **155.9%** of ATK plus **935** and dealing increasing damage of **5%** with each hit. Immune to control effects while active. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

discharge.name: Frost Barrier
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and smash the ground to form a barrier, dealing damage equal to **553.5%** of ATK plus **3321** to nearby enemies, suspending the targets. This reduces their speed by **50%** and stops them from dodging or jumping. The barrier lasts **5** seconds and blocks projectiles.

advancements.description: Increase shatter by **15%** and restore **10%** of HP after shattering the target's shield.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to **10%** of Max HP. Cooldown: **20** seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to **10** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Increase damage and shatter by **50%** while the shield is active.

Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to **20%** of Max HP and immunity to being controlled when shield is active. Cooldown: **20** seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to **10** seconds.
